title: Kat Von D Beauty nude lipsticks are coming, and we can‚Äôt wait to get our hands on them
text:
Kat Von D Beauty nude lipsticks are coming, and we can‚Äôt wait to get our hands on them You can‚Äôt help but see Kat Von D‚Äôs success as a beauty mogul and think, ‚ÄúYou go, girl!‚Äù Especially if you‚Äôve been a fan since her days on Miami Ink. 
Kat Von D Beauty‚Äôs Everlasting Liquid Lipsticks have a cult following, and rightfully so. The vegan, cruelty-free shades are super pigmented, long-lasting and not as dry as other liquid lipstick formulas. Kat‚Äôs adding to the 30-shade collection with six new nude colors set to hit Sephora.com on January 24th. The new nude Everlasting Liquid Lipsticks will also be sold as a bundle in February.
Kat‚Äôs Everlasting Liquid Lipsticks retail from $20 so we expect the same this go ‚Äôround. There‚Äôs usually a price break on bundles so expect the collection of six to be just under $120, probably $110 but we‚Äôre hoping for an even $100.
New nudes coming your way Which one is your favorite?! Left to right: ‚†Ä ‚Ä¢Crucifix ‚Ä¢Ophelia ‚Ä¢Hawkwind ‚Ä¢Ludwig ‚Ä¢Sanctuary ‚Ä¢Mu√±eca ‚†Ä Launching online at Sephora.com on 1/24 and in stores on 2/2 {launching INTERNATIONALLY starting in MAY! } #katvondbeauty #crueltyfreebeauty #vegan #everlastingliquidlipstick 
A photo posted by Kat Von D Beauty (@katvondbeauty) on Jan 11, 2017 at 7:23pm PST 
From left to right there‚Äôs Crucifix (a deep chocolate), Ophelia (a nude chestnut), Hawkwind (a nude sienna), Ludwig (a nude fawn), Sanctuary (a cool sepia), and Mu√±eca (a nude petal).

Mark your calendars for January 24th if you wanna get your hands on these shades. If you‚Äôve got your heart set on a bundle, start saving those coins like, NOW.
